about.title: About me
about.intro: My name is Daniel Oyola Moreno and I am a 20-year-old young developer who lives in Badajoz, passionate about this world and likes to learn all kinds of technologies.
about.description: I specialize in frontend development with React, Angular and TypeScript, but I also have experience in backend with Springboot. I love solving complex problems and learning new technologies.

skills.title: Skills
skills.problemSolvingDesc: Ability to analyze and solve complex problems efficiently.
skills.teamworkDesc: Effective collaboration with multidisciplinary teams and clear communication.
skills.learningDesc: Constant updating in new technologies and best practices.
skills.timeManagementDesc: Effective organization and prioritization of tasks and projects.
skills.creativityDesc: Proposal of innovative solutions and out-of-the-box thinking.
skills.punctualityDesc: Commitment to deadlines and timely project delivery.

titles.title: Obtained Titles
titles.smrDesc: Studies focused on the installation, configuration and maintenance of computer systems, local networks and internet services, with emphasis on technical problem solving and computer security.
